data.title: Karolinska Institutet
data.meta_description: Current positionsAssistant professor, Karolinska InstitutetResident physician (ST-läkare), Center for Diabetes, Region StockholmAffiliated researcher, University of TokyoEducation/previous positionsDocent in epidemiology, Karolinska Institutet, 2020Intern physician (AT-läkare), Södersjukhuset, 2017-2020Post-doctoral researcher, Harvard University, 2014-2016PhD, Karolinska Institutet, 2014BSc, Stockholm School of Economics (Handelshögskolan), 2012MD, Karolinska Institutet, 2012
